result.title: Two Integrated Fablab prototypes
result.description: Two prototype devices will be built Rapid prototyping approaches such as additive layer manufacturing will be explored to ensure that many of the bespoke internals of fablab can be produced potentially with iterative design This task will encompass the fabrication of the individual dispensing dosing mixing and cleaning tools that will define the physical internal operations of fablab along with the electrical systems data acquisition and process control units that will provide the digital brainpower and functionality
